name: RYUON-stokes
body:
### Welcome to RYUON-stokes Pages.
[RYUON-stokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/stokes/) is a Stokesian dynamics simulator. Using [libstokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libstokes/), [RYUON-stokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/stokes/) can solve resistance and mobility problems under the periodic boundary condition with F, FT, and FTS versions for full 3D as well as semi-2D (monolayer) configurations. For each of them, there are two versions, with or without lubrication correction. For mobility problem, also fixed particles can be handled.

### about RYUON project
RYUON-stokes is a part of [RYUON project](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/).

For details about RYUON-stokes, go to [RYUON-stokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/stokes/)

### Authors and Contributors
Kengo Ichiki (@kichiki)

RYUON-stokes project is released under [GNU General Public License, version 2](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)
